languages.text: "Источником заразы была стая мутантов. Они истреблены. Несколько человек выжило внутри периметра, но они не представляют угрозы".

traits.locale_text: "Источником заразы была стая мутантов. Они истреблены. Несколько человек выжило внутри периметра, но они не представляют угрозы".

languages.text: "The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."
languages.original_text: "Источником заразы была стая мутантов. Они истреблены. Несколько человек выжило внутри периметра, но они не представляют угрозы".

traits.locale_text: "The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."
"The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."
"The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."
"The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."
"The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."

languages.text: “疾病的源头是一群变种人，他们已经被消灭了。周边地区还有一部分幸存者，他们并不会构成任何威胁。”
languages.original_text: "The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."

traits.locale_text: “疾病的源头是一群变种人，他们已经被消灭了。周边地区还有一部分幸存者，他们并不会构成任何威胁。”

languages.text: «La fuente de la enfermedad era una manada de mutantes. Han sido exterminados. Quedan unos pocos en el perímetro, pero no suponen una amenaza».
languages.original_text: "The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."

traits.locale_text: «La fuente de la enfermedad era una manada de mutantes. Han sido exterminados. Quedan unos pocos en el perímetro, pero no suponen una amenaza».

languages.text: 「病の原因は変異体の群れだ。元凶は排除した。周辺に生存者が何人かいるが、こちらに危険はない」
languages.original_text: "The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."

traits.locale_text: 「病の原因は変異体の群れだ。元凶は排除した。周辺に生存者が何人かいるが、こちらに危険はない」

languages.text: "Der Ursprung der Krankheit war ein Rudel Mutanten. Sie wurden ausgelöscht. Ein paar Überlebende sind noch innerhalb der Zone, stellen aber keine Bedrohung dar."
languages.original_text: "The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."

traits.locale_text: "Der Ursprung der Krankheit war ein Rudel Mutanten. Sie wurden ausgelöscht. Ein paar Überlebende sind noch innerhalb der Zone, stellen aber keine Bedrohung dar."

languages.text: « Un groupe de mutants était responsable de cette maladie. Ils ont été exterminés. Il reste encore quelques survivants dans le périmètre, mais la menace est écartée. »
languages.original_text: "The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."

traits.locale_text: « Un groupe de mutants était responsable de cette maladie. Ils ont été exterminés. Il reste encore quelques survivants dans le périmètre, mais la menace est écartée. »

languages.text: "Hastalığa bir mutant sürüsü sebep olmuş. Yok edildiler. Civarda hâlâ birkaçı sağ ama onlar da tehdit teşkil etmiyor."
languages.original_text: "The source of the disease was a pack of mutants. They have been exterminated. A few survivors remain within the perimeter, but they pose no threat."

traits.locale_text: "Hastalığın kaynağı bir mutant sürüsüydü. Yok edildiler. Hayatta kalmayı başaran birkaç kişi var civarda ama tehdit teşkil etmiyorlar."
